text: Kirsten Patricia Hudson (born 2 February 1988) is a New Zealand water polo player. She is a member of the New Zealand women's national water polo team. She played at the 2009 World Aquatics Championships, 2011 World Aquatics Championships, 2017 World Aquatics Championships, and 2018 FINA Women's Water Polo World Cup. She played for Hartwick College's women's water polo team. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand water polo players
title: Kirsten Hudson
